General.Name: Volvere PLC
General.Description: Volvere plc is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in distressed/vulture, growth capital, acquisitions, emerging growth and turnaround investments. The firm prefers to invest in companies that are in distress and prefers undervalued or under-performing assets. The firm invests in the security solutions, food manufacturing. It invests across the world. The firm prefers companies that fit strategically with an existing portfolio investment. It prefers to invest up to $20 million in equity per transaction and minimum target sales value of $10 million. The firm prefers to invest from it balance sheet. Volvere plc was founded in 2002 and is based in Warwickshire, United Kingdom.
